question: A band of homeless beggers asks if they can come in.
no: If the beggers haven't gone to another player yet, beggers go to next player, otherwise nothing happens.

question: One of your citizens asks if they can build a circus.
yes: +5 population from each player, +10 happiness, -5 money, -5 resources.

question: A person thinks you should raise taxes.
A group of lumberjacks asks if they can cut down some of your forests.
A CEO asks you to invest in his company.
A CEO asks you to invest in his company.
A doctor wants you to make all drugs illegal.
A mysterious soothsayer tells you that a monster will attack, and that you should build a wall.
A builder thinks that you should build more houses.
yes: -10 resources, -5 money, +5 population from each player
